Mothers teach, love, guide, support, protect, listen, provide, console, and defend. 

Their heart, wisdom, will and strength carry us through good times and bad. 

Happy #MothersDay and THANK YOU to all of the moms! ❤️ 💐
Public Service Announcement for those on Twitter who apparently need a refresher: The Pledge of Allegiance doesn’t end with “liberty and justice for all, except General Michael Flynn.”

I’m in DC right now. The House of Reps should be here at work. Any member of leadership who thinks the House isn’t essential should step down. Any House Member who feels like they aren’t essential should do the same. This is the time to be working harder than ever, not to go AWOL

VICTORY! 75 years ago today, evil in its worst form was defeated, the Nazis unconditionally surrendered and Victory in Europe was courageously secured by the United States of America and our allies. #VEDay75 🇺🇸

This #NursesWeek is like none other and our country has an appreciation for our amazing nurses like never before. They are fighting hard for us here in NY and all across the US. They have shown strength, courage, skill and poise and our appreciation needs to go far beyond words.

No act of Congress will be as effective to get our economy roaring again as getting our economy reopened again. States need to do this smartly and precisely in a way that prevents another outbreak. As more businesses can reopen, our economy will be unleashed for a great rebound.

If a higher ed institution has a large $40 BIL endowment, a company is flush with cash, or an individual is comfortably sitting on massive wealth, I don’t see a need for them to get a dime of emergency coronavirus funding. These bills must be focused on survival, not fortune.
